feature.label: ModIt Sirius integration Feature
feature.description:
Mod-it : Modelling-as-code
Library to easily create or reverse models using a XTend syntax. The format in which models are saved are as readable as a YAML file but with the full capacity of code. Using such syntax helps for example to : * Speed up the creation of tests * Improve the readability of the tests * Improve maintainability when the tested metamodel changes * Ease the creation of inter-connected models
Include Eclipse Sirius integration
